Divide intervals into new sub-intervals ("windows").

Source: R/bed_makewindows.r
bed_makewindows.Rd

Divide intervals into new sub-intervals ("windows").

bed_makewindows(x, genome = NULL, win_size = 0, step_size = 0,
  num_win = 0, reverse = FALSE)

Arguments

x

tbl_interval()
genome

this argument has been deprecated and is not used
win_size

divide intervals into fixed-size windows
step_size

size to step before next window
num_win

divide intervals to fixed number of windows
reverse

reverse window numbers

Value

tbl_interval() with .win_id column that contains a numeric identifier for the window.

Note

The name and .win_id columns can be used to create new interval names (see 'namenum' example below) or in subsequent group_by operations (see vignette).

See also

Other utilities: bed12_to_exons, bound_intervals, flip_strands, interval_spacing

Examples

x <- trbl_interval(
  ~chrom, ~start, ~end, ~name, ~score, ~strand,
  "chr1", 100,    200,  'A',   '.',    '+'
)

bed_glyph(bed_makewindows(x, num_win = 10), label = '.win_id')

# Fixed number of windows
bed_makewindows(x, num_win = 10)
#> [90m# A tibble: 10 x 7[39m
#>    chrom start   end name  score strand .win_id
#>    [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m    [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m
#> [90m 1[39m chr1    100   110 A     .     +            1
#> [90m 2[39m chr1    110   120 A     .     +            2
#> [90m 3[39m chr1    120   130 A     .     +            3
#> [90m 4[39m chr1    130   140 A     .     +            4
#> [90m 5[39m chr1    140   150 A     .     +            5
#> [90m 6[39m chr1    150   160 A     .     +            6
#> [90m 7[39m chr1    160   170 A     .     +            7
#> [90m 8[39m chr1    170   180 A     .     +            8
#> [90m 9[39m chr1    180   190 A     .     +            9
#> [90m10[39m chr1    190   200 A     .     +           10

# Fixed window size
bed_makewindows(x, win_size = 10)
#> [90m# A tibble: 10 x 7[39m
#>    chrom start   end name  score strand .win_id
#>    [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m    [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m
#> [90m 1[39m chr1    100   110 A     .     +            1
#> [90m 2[39m chr1    110   120 A     .     +            2
#> [90m 3[39m chr1    120   130 A     .     +            3
#> [90m 4[39m chr1    130   140 A     .     +            4
#> [90m 5[39m chr1    140   150 A     .     +            5
#> [90m 6[39m chr1    150   160 A     .     +            6
#> [90m 7[39m chr1    160   170 A     .     +            7
#> [90m 8[39m chr1    170   180 A     .     +            8
#> [90m 9[39m chr1    180   190 A     .     +            9
#> [90m10[39m chr1    190   200 A     .     +           10

# Fixed window size with overlaps
bed_makewindows(x, win_size = 10, step_size = 5)
#> [90m# A tibble: 20 x 7[39m
#>    chrom start   end name  score strand .win_id
#>    [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m    [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m
#> [90m 1[39m chr1    100   110 A     .     +            1
#> [90m 2[39m chr1    105   115 A     .     +            2
#> [90m 3[39m chr1    110   120 A     .     +            3
#> [90m 4[39m chr1    115   125 A     .     +            4
#> [90m 5[39m chr1    120   130 A     .     +            5
#> [90m 6[39m chr1    125   135 A     .     +            6
#> [90m 7[39m chr1    130   140 A     .     +            7
#> [90m 8[39m chr1    135   145 A     .     +            8
#> [90m 9[39m chr1    140   150 A     .     +            9
#> [90m10[39m chr1    145   155 A     .     +           10
#> [90m11[39m chr1    150   160 A     .     +           11
#> [90m12[39m chr1    155   165 A     .     +           12
#> [90m13[39m chr1    160   170 A     .     +           13
#> [90m14[39m chr1    165   175 A     .     +           14
#> [90m15[39m chr1    170   180 A     .     +           15
#> [90m16[39m chr1    175   185 A     .     +           16
#> [90m17[39m chr1    180   190 A     .     +           17
#> [90m18[39m chr1    185   195 A     .     +           18
#> [90m19[39m chr1    190   200 A     .     +           19
#> [90m20[39m chr1    195   200 A     .     +           20

# reverse win_id
bed_makewindows(x, win_size = 10, reverse = TRUE)
#> [90m# A tibble: 10 x 7[39m
#>    chrom start   end name  score strand .win_id
#>    [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m    [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m
#> [90m 1[39m chr1    100   110 A     .     +           10
#> [90m 2[39m chr1    110   120 A     .     +            9
#> [90m 3[39m chr1    120   130 A     .     +            8
#> [90m 4[39m chr1    130   140 A     .     +            7
#> [90m 5[39m chr1    140   150 A     .     +            6
#> [90m 6[39m chr1    150   160 A     .     +            5
#> [90m 7[39m chr1    160   170 A     .     +            4
#> [90m 8[39m chr1    170   180 A     .     +            3
#> [90m 9[39m chr1    180   190 A     .     +            2
#> [90m10[39m chr1    190   200 A     .     +            1

# bedtools 'namenum'
wins <- bed_makewindows(x, win_size = 10)
dplyr::mutate(wins, namenum = stringr::str_c(name, '_', .win_id))
#> [90m# A tibble: 10 x 8[39m
#>    chrom start   end name  score strand .win_id namenum
#>    [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m    [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m  
#> [90m 1[39m chr1    100   110 A     .     +            1 A_1    
#> [90m 2[39m chr1    110   120 A     .     +            2 A_2    
#> [90m 3[39m chr1    120   130 A     .     +            3 A_3    
#> [90m 4[39m chr1    130   140 A     .     +            4 A_4    
#> [90m 5[39m chr1    140   150 A     .     +            5 A_5    
#> [90m 6[39m chr1    150   160 A     .     +            6 A_6    
#> [90m 7[39m chr1    160   170 A     .     +            7 A_7    
#> [90m 8[39m chr1    170   180 A     .     +            8 A_8    
#> [90m 9[39m chr1    180   190 A     .     +            9 A_9    
#> [90m10[39m chr1    190   200 A     .     +           10 A_10
